I am very pleased that my two kids are enjoying their learning at my first skool AMK Blk 601, the teachers, principal and Dcl are extremely caring and attentive to my kids needs, thank you everyone for the hard working, I will definitely recommend to other people.

We were recommended this school by a friend and are very happy with it. The teachers are competent and genuinely caring, which - to me - is the most important factor in choosing a school. My child loves her teachers and loves going to school.

Being first time parents, we were naturally concerned about choosing the right playgroup centre. During our first centre tour, we were impressed by the teachers and the learning environment. We felt the teachers genuinely cared for each and every child.

Having enrolled in the centre for about 8months, our child has shown great improvements in his social skills and is more independent.

Thankful to all the amazing teachers! Special thanks to Principal Ms Weiwei, Teacher Yen, Teacher Krisha, Teacher Liu, Teacher Yi-Ting üéâü•≥
